name: CaptivateIQ
headline: Agile commission software to design, deploy & adapt commission plans.
description:
CaptivateIQ is on a journey to modernize the world of incentive compensation. Our hope is that people will feel more connected at work if there is greater transparency in how they are rewarded for their efforts.

We partner with amazing companies like Carta, Intercom, Gong, and Newfront Insurance to simplify their commissions. 

Since launching in 2017, we have raised $63M and are backed by leading investors including Sequoia Capital, Accel, S28 Capital, Amity Ventures, and Y Combinator.

# It’s time to rethink your Return on Incentives with CaptivateIQ
Save money, hit targets, and prepare for future growth. In the era of efficient growth, it's more important than ever to get the highest possible return on your incentive programs.
[Book a Meeting](https://www.captivateiq.com/</request-demo>)[Tour the Product](https://www.captivateiq.com/<https:/captivateiq.navattic.com/695l0e0h>)

# Automate commissions. Motivate reps. Captivate with insights.
[Automate Commissions](https://www.captivateiq.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Motivate Reps](https://www.captivateiq.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Captivate with Insights](https://www.captivateiq.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
[Automate Commissions](https://www.captivateiq.com/<#>)
# Save time, improve accuracy, empower admins
  * ![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff7_check.svg)
Experience the ease of building plans with the familiarity of a spreadsheet, without the risk of human error.
  * ![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff7_check.svg)
Manage more commission payouts faster with our SmartGrid™ ELT and calculation engine.
  * ![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff7_check.svg)
Design, implement, and manage commission plans without relying on contractors, IT, or data teams.


[Learn More](https://www.captivateiq.com/</product/automate>)
![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4e059_Product%20Vignette%20%E2%80%93%20Automate%20Commissions%20-%20Updated%20\(1\).webp)
[Motivate Reps](https://www.captivateiq.com/<#>)
# Build trust with reps and drive revenue results
  * ![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff7_check.svg)
Deliver historical and upcoming earnings data so reps stay focused on selling, not on commissions.
  * ![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff7_check.svg)
Boost motivation and competition with an interactive what-if calculator and real time attainment leaderboards.
  * ![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff7_check.svg)
Provide clarity around plans, payouts and how to boost earnings with CaptivateIQ’s AI-powered Payee coach.

[Learn More](https://www.captivateiq.com/</product/motivate>)
![Image Desciprtion](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4e02f_Group%2040245.png)
[Captivate with Insights](https://www.captivateiq.com/<#>)
# Make compensation a strategic business lever
  * ![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff7_check.svg)
Understand real-time plan performance with out-of-the-box and advanced reporting powered by SmartGrid™.
  * ![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff7_check.svg)
Build a trust- and data-driven culture with sales team leaderboards, scenario modeling, and more.
  * ![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff7_check.svg)
Identify trends and understand immediate program impact across plans and more with customizable dashboards.

[Learn More](https://www.captivateiq.com/</product/captivate>)

![trustradius](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dffe_trustradius.svg)
# Built for Enterprise complexity and scale
CaptivateIQ helps you tackle even the most complex sales commission challenges in no time—processing up to 20 million transactions in less than four seconds.
[Tour the Product](https://www.captivateiq.com/<https:/captivateiq.navattic.com/695l0e0h>)[Explore Enterprise](https://www.captivateiq.com/</enterprise>)
![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dffb_icon1.svg)
## Powerful SmartGrid™ technology
Having firsthand experience with the pain of commissions, our founders built a modern modeling experience. With our SmartGrid™ ELT and calculation engine, you can model plans and calculate commissions at scale.
![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff8_icon2.svg)
## Get your commissions up and running—fast
Quickly create and customize plans and test your payout calculations in real time without breaking the bank. Launch in as little as two weeks to three months.
![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dffa_icon3.svg)
## Retain total ownership
CaptivateIQ’s no-code platform offers unbeatable flexibility and scalability for all your commissions needs. Create reports and model plan changes with just a few clicks—no technical expertise necessary.
![Image Description](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e20acf46e0215232a00fa2f/652d000a1d03208622d4dff9_icon4.svg)
## Comprehensive security and compliance
Protecting your sensitive data is our top priority. Our compliance program meets industry-leading information security standards, undergoing annual independent audits for SOC 1 and SOC 2 compliance.
# Improve commissions for every team
[Compensation ManagersEffortlessly manage compensation with automated, flexible, and simplified workflows and save valuable time throughout the entire process.Learn More](https://www.captivateiq.com/</archive/compensation-manager>)
[Finance and AccountingSlash commission processing time from three weeks to three days. Get a clear view of your expenses and sales results to maximize incentives.Learn More](https://www.captivateiq.com/</archive/finance-accounting>)
[Revenue OperationsSimplify commission management for more time and focus on boosting revenue with pay transparency for reps.Learn More](https://www.captivateiq.com/</archive/revenue-operations>)
[Sales LeadersStay on top of your sales metrics and provide real-time feedback to your reps. Gain insights on successes and identify areas for improvement.Learn More](https://www.captivateiq.com/</archive/sales-management>)
## Bring data from anywhere, in any format
CaptivateIQ is the only sales commission platform that can centralize and enrich data from disparate data sources into one powerful platform—a single source of truth that’s ready for analysis.

# Built for Enterprise complexity and scale
CaptivateIQ helps you tackle even the most complex sales commission challenges in no time—processing up to 20 million transactions in less than four seconds.
Tour the Product⟨45⟩Explore Enterprise⟨19⟩
![Image Description⟨72⟩]
## Powerful SmartGrid™ technology
Having firsthand experience with the pain of commissions, our founders built a modern modeling experience. With our SmartGrid™ ELT and calculation engine, you can model plans and calculate commissions at scale.
![Image Description⟨73⟩]
## Get your commissions up and running—fast
Quickly create and customize plans and test your payout calculations in real time without breaking the bank. Launch in as little as two weeks to three months.
![Image Description⟨74⟩]
## Retain total ownership
CaptivateIQ’s no-code platform offers unbeatable flexibility and scalability for all your commissions needs. Create reports and model plan changes with just a few clicks—no technical expertise necessary.
![Image Description⟨75⟩]
## Comprehensive security and compliance
Protecting your sensitive data is our top priority. Our compliance program meets industry-leading information security standards, undergoing annual independent audits for SOC 1 and SOC 2 compliance.
# Improve commissions for every team
Compensation ManagersEffortlessly manage compensation with automated, flexible, and simplified workflows and save valuable time throughout the entire process.Learn More⟨76⟩
Finance and AccountingSlash commission processing time from three weeks to three days. Get a clear view of your expenses and sales results to maximize incentives.Learn More⟨77⟩
Revenue OperationsSimplify commission management for more time and focus on boosting revenue with pay transparency for reps.Learn More⟨78⟩
Sales LeadersStay on top of your sales metrics and provide real-time feedback to your reps. Gain insights on successes and identify areas for improvement.Learn More⟨79⟩
## Bring data from anywhere, in any format
CaptivateIQ is the only sales commission platform that can centralize and enrich data from disparate data sources into one powerful platform—a single source of truth that’s ready for analysis.

generated_description:
CaptivateIQ is pioneering the modern landscape of commission software, focused on creating an agile, transparent platform that empowers organizations to design, deploy, and adapt incentive programs effectively. Founded in 2017 out of the Y Combinator W18 batch, the company is on a mission to enhance workplace connectivity by increasing transparency around how employees are rewarded for their efforts.

Operating from San Francisco with a team of 280, CaptivateIQ has partnered with notable companies like Carta, Intercom, Gong, and Newfront Insurance to simplify their commission processes. The company has successfully raised $63 million, backed by top-tier investors including Sequoia Capital, Accel, S28 Capital, and Y Combinator.

CaptivateIQ offers a suite of tools that include:
- **Commission Automation**: A no-code engine for automating commission calculations.
- **Sales Performance Management**: Tools to help businesses optimize their sales plans.
- **Real-Time Insights**: Advanced reporting to leverage compensation data strategically.

The company stresses the importance of "Return on Incentives," arguing that effective commission management can be a crucial driver of revenue performance. Their technology is robust enough to handle complex calculations, processing up to 20 million transactions in under four seconds.

What’s compelling about CaptivateIQ is not just the product, but their commitment to making commission structures more efficient and equitable. They believe that when teams understand how their efforts translate into rewards, it fosters a more engaged workforce.

For those interested in learning more, CaptivateIQ's website is a goldmine of resources and insights into the evolving practices of incentive compensation.
